#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<set>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

#define REP(I, N) for(int I = 0; I < (N); I++)
#define FOR(I, A, B) for(int I = (A); I <= (B); I++)
#define FORD(I, A, B) for(int I = (A); I >= (B); I--)
#define ll long long
#define F first
#define S second
#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back

int t, n;
ll ret;

int main()
{
  scanf("%d", &t);
  while(t--)
  {
    scanf("%d", &n);
    if(n == 1)
      ret = 0;
    else
    {
      if(n&1)
	ret = (ll)n*(n+1)-(ll)(n/2+1)*(n/2+2)-(n/2)-(n/2+1)-(ll)(n/2-1)*(n/2);
      else
	ret = (ll)n*(n+1)-(ll)(n/2+1)*(n/2+2)-(n/2)+(n/2+1)-(ll)(n/2-1)*(n/2);
    }
    printf("%lld\n", ret);
  }

}
